## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                                  | Type      | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ----------- |
| `hideMobile` | `hide-mobile` | If true, will be hidden on mobile resolutions (under 640px). | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `size`       | `size`        | Size in grid units, 1 - 12.                                  | `number`  | `undefined` |
